Item.Name: Junk
Item.Description: Nothing of this sort will be of much use.

Result.Name: Area Room Teleport - From Sedan to Broken Cityscape
P. State Change - Pass. Seat - Bag and Flashlight Remain
P. State Change - Pass. Seat - Bag and Scissors Remain
P. State Change - Pass. Seat - Bag Remains
P. State Change - Pass. Seat - Empty
P. State Change - Pass. Seat - Flashlight Remains
P. State Change - Pass. Seat - Scissors and Flashlight Remain
P. State Change - Pass. Seat - Scissors Remain
R. State Change - Interior - No Laptop

Message.Name: Bag Inspect Message 1
Message.Text: The bag is an unassuming beige, crowned with the cartoonish logo of a discount grocery store.

Message.Name: Bag Take Message 1
Message.Text: You crumple the bag into a small ball.

Message.Name: Door (Locked) Operate/Travel Message 1
Message.Text: You realize that you'll probably spill the laptop onto the asphalt outside if you don't move it first.

Message.Name: Door (Unlocked) Operate/Travel Message 1
Message.Text: You pull the level and push open the door.

Message.Name: Door Inspect Message 1
Message.Text: The window crank is missing; you remember having it removed after the mechanism broke and the window fell into the door panel.

Message.Name: Flashlight Inspect Message 1
Message.Text: The plastic body is a dull red, bereft of any texture.

Message.Name: Flashlight Take Message 1
Message.Text: As you lift the flashlight you realize that it is far too light to be holding any batteries.

Message.Name: Laptop Inspect Message 1
Message.Text: A text editor glares back at you, subsuming the screen and seizing your gaze.

Message.Name: Laptop Operate Message 1
Message.Text: You move to type, but the keys refuse to yield.

Message.Name: Laptop Take Message 1
Message.Text: You fold up the laptop and pull it closer. The plastic is hot against your body.

Message.Name: Scissors Inspect Message 1
Message.Text: Even in the diffuse light filling the cabin the blades shine as though held beneath a spotlight, hard and bright.

Message.Name: Scissors Take Message 1
Message.Text: The metal is cool to the touch, but just as heavy as you expected.

Message.Name: Sedan Inspect Message 1
Message.Text: The interior is cramped, smelling vaguely of dust and fast food. Faded receipts are crammed into every available orifice. The thin lines of an inexplicable fracture spread like sharply angled fingers along the surface of the rear view mirror.

Message.Name: Sedan Inspect Message 2
Message.Text: Though the keys are in the ignition, the vehicle is not running.

Message.Name: Windshield Inspect Message 1
Message.Text: Muted gray light pours in through the windows, nearly the exact same shade as the fabric lining the vehicle's seats.

Message.Name: Windshield Inspect Message 2
Message.Text: Through the rainwater-baptised glass you see the outline of the vehicle’s hood, raised as though for maintenance. Beyond that, the blurry shape of a large concrete structure is visible.

ParagraphState.Text: You sit in the driver’s seat of an old, poorly maintained sedan.
Splashes of water cling to the windshield; evidence of a recently concluded rain shower.
Clutter fills the passenger’s seat: A crumpled up plastic bag, a pair of kitchen scissors, and a small flashlight.
Clutter fills the passenger’s seat: A crumpled up plastic bag and a small flashlight.
Clutter fills the passenger’s seat: A pair of kitchen scissors and a small flashlight.
Clutter fills the passenger’s seat: A crumpled up plastic bag and a pair of kitchen scissors.
A crumpled up plastic bag rests in the seat beside you.
A pair of kitchen scissors rest in the seat beside you.
A small flashlight rests in the seat beside you.
The passenger's seat is empty, exposing a dull kaleidoscope of assorted soda stains.
The garish light emanating from the laptop lying open before you has ignited a small tic in your right temple.
The door to your left is unlocked.
You lean against the driver’s side door, your back pressed up against the dusky light of early morning.
An immense black obelisk stands before you, blocking any further progression westward.
To the east the road curves down a gentle hill.
You stand beside the rusted, decaying remains of your vehicle, itself parked just outside a crumbling parking garage.
A road curves near the entrance to the garage, winding up a slope to the north and out of sight beyond the hollow husk of a brick building.
To the east the road tracks a straight line beneath the canopy of trees lining its perimeter.
